info.+content: #1: "Bai YaiYai -Obocchama-kun no Theme-" (ぶぁいYaiYai-おぼっちゃまくんのテーマ-) by Ingurimonguri
#1: "Ichidodake I LOVE YOU -Samayo-chan ni Sasageru Uta-" (一度だけI LOVE YOU-沙麻代ちゃんに捧げるうた-) by Ingurimonguri
#2: "Yōshanaku Itoshite" (容赦なく愛して) by Risa Honda
#3: "EVERYBODY〜YOU ARE THE ONLY ONE" by BABY'S
#5: "Mūn'na Kimochi wa o Senchi" (む〜んな気持ちはおセンチ) by Mi-Ke
#6: "Go! Go! Hammer-chama [Count it Off]" (GO! GO! ハマちゃま [COUNT IT OFF]) by Hammer ft. The Home Boy Chair

title.+content: isago asa dai chan ai wo KURI
yoru no gakkou wa osoroshi kko
otasuke gundan sanjou ! otetsudai wa tanochinko
tensai chama ! kyoufu no sai narakkya bakudan
o, otta ma GETA ! hekeke nao chichichama
moeyo tomodachi ken ! ikari no kakutou RINGU
shonna BANANA ? kono yo ni sai narakki ?
okane no kireme ga zekko-mon buai !
dai bua kuhatsu ! oku yuka shiri no geijutsu ka
ari ga TAMA ari ga tamatamapaati tengoku
odorokinta ! maa zekkou kamen 2 gou toujou ?
PETTO sensou boppatsu ! PIEERU en no satogaeri
gobou ka TONGARI densetsu ! oomono wa tsuraka buai
bijokko dai sakusen wa DAMEDAME DANSU !
nante honetai ! kurikuri yama de HIIKORABAFUN
hekeke no kebyou de oBENKI deshakaa !
KISHUKISSHU ! fubuki no naka de tomodachinko
PANDA kono yaro ? ! HAWAI de atama ni kitahankyuu
he ga go~shi ? ! honoo no CHAMASAPIENSU monogatari
jou kametai ! KAMEKAMEKAME no KAME hen bua~i
hemi ? oyako de PEROPERO yo~sha naku aishite
herya !? matamo moro da shi kimi
chamachama dai henshin ? fuzaken ja NEEKO !
KOKOA doko wagashi wa dare ? aruku shoukin 10 oku en !
burei MOMO ! FUN okoshi 1 ban yo-shai naki HOTERU
shinju rarena-i ? KAME no wakusei de he-hekekya
hemi ? hekyashu banashi de TAKUWAN de shimauma ?
anta da rei ? hekeke na RETTSU GOUSUTO !
MOO ushi KUESUCHON ! GEEMU no naka wa daikon ran
otta ma GETA ! akazu no ma de konni CHIWAWA
anta no yu-koto nanka kikan sha
he -hekekya ! hin ho no kinko ga nusumare TANSU ?
erai koucha ! ochichi-chama no yo-sha naki himitsu
mou benkyou ! nani ga nandaka SAPPARIWAKAMERAAMEN
koi no kisetsu KAME hen buai
isago asa dai ROBO dai shuugou
PANDA kori wa ? uchuu no hate kara OUCHINCHIN
HEKEKE no kokoro de DOKUROU-sama deshi ? !
HEPOPOPO～N ! ojousama wa semai no ga osuki
ure PIGYAASU ! anata no oshiri mo PIKKAPIKA
nande SHIKA sori ? hego ! ai no PEROPEROKOURU
sennyuu shirei ! OUDISHON de konban WAIN
chikyuu saigo no hi ? HARAHOROHIREHAREE suisei !
aa mujou ! hin ho ka houkai
ai to meiyo to YOME sa ga shi
hebi ! aoge ba toutoshi itoshi no hito
dai HAADO na shitsuren DANSU PAATII !
RETTSUGOUSUTO ! reikai bouken wa omoshi REEKAI ?
hekyasshu niku kin chokin ! DONTO otta ma geta
fushigi mahou ! konna ko toshite enkai ?
ai to seishun no gyaku nobori
FUN korobi hachi oki ! AIRABU hin ho
dai chouhen hekeke na uchuu de HEPO~N. zenpen
dai chouhen hekeke na uchuu de HEPO~N. kouhen
HEPOUN matamata chama bi ? sou kamome
dokkin ! konna bijin de sumimasen en
erai koucha ! koko de atta ga hyaku en dama
atama ni kaki no ki ? sonna koto a KYANDEE
yame tenka ! chuushingura nante ikemasen zo
OUNOU ! chinrei shashin de YUUREI HOU
he-i KAMO jo ! ai shiatteru kai ?
nante hone tai ! kono UNAGI ri mo nome-
koisuru fukurokouji kun ! sori wa hon tokei ?
kage chama SHIRIIZU ten no maki hikari to kage
kage chama SHIRIIZU chi no maki dasshutsu !!
kage chama SHIRIIZU owari no maki fukkatsu !!
shi gyapi-- !! nani shiya ga RUNBA
hemi ? isago asa dai chan wo shiri ma SENBEI
koko wa dokan ! MONKII aru ka
shinbun haitatsu ? kono sekken shirazu me
yubi kiri genmai cha ? maru wa YAKAN !
toumei ningen ? yoku ii MANGA na
atama ni ougon ? sonna koto aruke-
dai bouken ! zekkai no chikyuu ou. zenpen
dai bouken ! zekkai no chikyuu ou. kouhen

news.+content: Sony Yay Airs <cite>Obocchama-kun</cite> Anime on May 24
1989 <cite>Obocchama-kun</cite> Anime Episodes Stream With English Subtitles Until March 31
